sentences:
Black Butter Records is a formerly independent record label based in London , England that releases various styles of electronic music .
It was founded in 2010 by Olly Wood , Henry Village and Joe Gossa , 
It was intended initially as an outlet for musicians who were signed to their artist management company , Stackhouse Management , and as a reaction against other labels that were " genre specific " .
The label releases mostly singles , and has put out the first releases of artists including Clean Bandit , Rudimental , and Jessie Ware .
It was awarded ' Best Small Label ' at the 2012 Association of Independent Music Awards , and has been described as a " hub " of the British electronic music scene .
